name: Verify that the user is able to add the product to the cart by using the 'Add to Cart' button.
Verify that when the user clicks on the 'Add to cart' button, the product quantity will increase as a result of clicking the cart button.
Verify whether the user can add the product to the cart and proceed to checkout using PayPal.
Verify that user able to navigate to login page after the active account
Verify that the user should be able to delete the product from the cart.
Verify that the user should be able to log into the system
Verify that when a user logs into the system for the first time, the user should be navigated to the dashboard page
Verify that the user is able to see 'MY ACCOUNT' after clicking on the player profile
Verify that the user should be able to change/update the product quantity from the 'YOUR CART'.
Verify that the user should be able to select multiple variants of the product and add them to the cart.
Verify that the user is able to see the '100' points credited message after activating their account
Verify that the user is able to see the '600' points credited after clicking on the profile.
Verify that the user should be able to see the 500 points credited after updating their profile.
Verify that the user is able to see the product on the 'YOUR CART' page after adding it to the cart
Verify that the user is able to fill in the mandatory information for the payment process
Verify that the user should be able to add the product with the 'Select a Pack Size' option, and if the product is 'out of stock,' then the user should be able to select another pack size
